entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Nordegg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:44 a.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 15. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
